rdf:Description.dc:title: The Kathá Sarit Ságara, or Ocean of the Streams of Story
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Somadeva Bhaṭṭa (11th-century)
C. H. Tawney (1837–1922)
rdf:Description.dc:rights:
This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org.
This eBook is produced by the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net.
Scans of this work are available on the Internet Archive. First edition, published in 1880: Volume 1 (Books I to IX), Volume 2 (Books X to XVIII).
The second (revised) edition in ten volumes is also available: Volume 1 (Books I and II), Volume 2 (Books III to V), Volume 3 (Books VI and VII), Volume 4 (Book VIII), Volume 5 (Books X and XI), Volume 6 (Book XII), Volume 7 (Book XII, continued), Volume 8 (Books XIII to XVII), Volume 9 (Book XVIII), Volume 10 (Additional Material).
This second edition is also available in proofread PDF format.
The following table indicates how the volumes of the first edition relate to those of the second.
First edition Second edition Volume Page Volume I 1–99 I I 101–233 II I 235–403 III I 405–569 IV II 1–131 V II 133–275 VI II 275–409 VII II 411–561 VIII II 562–625 IX
